page.title: 11The Flower Show
page.content: The Flower Show is held each year in the Baillie Hall.There are lots of competitions for all age groups.The adults' competitions are for entering things like home grown flowers,vegetables and baking. The children's section has a miniature garden, a collection of wild flowers, a knitted scarf,writing of the Lord's Prayer and making an animal out of vegetables. The entries are judged on a Saturday. The judges pick the nicest, best arranged entry. One of the women who enters nearly every year is Mrs. Fisher, the school cleaner. She enters the Dundee Cake, Parkins,Scones, knitting and produce sections.She says she gets a lot of satisfaction out of entering, especially when she wins prizes.
